thread.title: Man United to thwart Real Madrid with David de Gea deal: This is how much he could earn
thread.title_full: Man United to thwart Real Madrid with David de Gea deal: This is how much he could earn

title: Man United to thwart Real Madrid with David de Gea deal: This is how much he could earn
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Man United to thwart Real Madrid with David de Gea deal: This is how much he could earn MANCHESTER UNITED could reportedly offer David de Gea a bumper pay rise to keep him at Old Trafford. PUBLISHED: 05:00,   05:01, Sun, Feb 12, 2017 
David de Gea came very close to signing for Real Madrid in the summer of 2015, however a deal fell through on deadline day due to paperwork complications. 
The Spaniard ended up committing his future to United by signing a new four-year deal worth £200,000-a-week. 
However, Real have resurrected their interest and could make a £55m bid for him in the summer. 
And the Star on Sunday claim United could activate his current deal and extend it by a further 12 months. GETTY David de Gea could earn around £300,000-a-week at Manchester United if he extends his contract GETTY Jose Mourinho doesn't expect Real to use underhand tactics to get David de Gea
